on reading compounds: 熊掌【ユウショウ】bear's palm (meat treasured in Ancient China)
熊の胆【クマノイ】bear's gall (used as medicine for the stomach), bear's bile
kun reading compounds: 熊【くま】bear (any mammal of family Ursidae)
熊手【くまで】rake, fork, bamboo rake
蜂熊【はちくま】crested honey buzzard (Pernis ptilorhynchus), Oriental honey buzzard, pern
